bibl.title: Archimandrites and Andrismos: a Preliminary Survey of Taxation at Bawit.

series.title: Österreichische Akademie der Wissenschaften. Philosophisch-historische Klasse. Kommission für antike Rechtsgeschichte. Papyrologica Vindobonensia.

bibl.note: Introduction. - Tax demands. - Fiscal administration within the monastery: the Our father documents. - Fiscal patronage. - Identification of 'Our father'. - Tax receipts and the identity of their signatories. - The collection of aparchê and the payment of dêmosion. - Concluding remarks.

bibl.title: Akten des 23. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses. Wien, 22.-28. Juli 2001

bibl.seg: CLACKSON Sarah J. †, Archimandrites and Andrismos: a Preliminary Survey of Taxation at Bawit.

Bernhard PALME (Hg.), Akten des 23. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses. Wien, 22.-28. Juli 2001 = Österreichische Akademie der Wissenschaften. Philosophisch-historische Klasse. Kommission für antike Rechtsgeschichte. Papyrologica Vindobonensia. 1 (Wien, 2007) pp. 103-107.

Introduction. - Tax demands. - Fiscal administration within the monastery: the Our father documents. - Fiscal patronage. - Identification of 'Our father'. - Tax receipts and the identity of their signatories. - The collection of aparchê and the payment of dêmosion. - Concluding remarks.
